    this.width    = width?width:200;  
    this.height = height?height:120;  
    this.timeout= 150;  
    this.speed    = 20; 
    this.step    = 1; 
    this.right    = screen.width -1;  
    this.bottom = screen.height; 
    this.left    = this.right - this.width; 
    this.top    = this.bottom - this.height; 
    this.timer    = 0; 
    this.pause    = false;
    this.close    = false;
    this.autoHide    = true;
}  
  
/**//*  
*    ������Ϣ����  
*/  
class_message.prototype.hide = function(){  
    if(this.onunload()){  

        var offset  = this.height>this.bottom-this.top?this.height:this.bottom-this.top; 
        var me  = this;  

        if(this.timer>0){   
            window.clearInterval(me.timer);  
        }  

        var fun = function(){  
            if(me.pause==false||me.close){
                var x  = me.left; 
                var y  = 0; 
                var width = me.width; 
                var height = 0; 
                if(me.offset>0){ 
                    height = me.offset; 
                } 
     
                y  = me.bottom - height; 
     
                if(y>=me.bottom){ 
                    window.clearInterval(me.timer);  
                    me.Pop.hide();  
                } else { 
                    me.offset = me.offset - me.step;  
                } 
                me.Pop.show(x,y,width,height);    
            }             
        }  

        this.timer = window.setInterval(fun,this.speed)      
    }  
}  
  
/**//*  
*    ��Ϣж���¼���������д  
*/  
class_message.prototype.onunload = function() {  
    return true;  
}  
/**//*  
*    ��Ϣ�����¼���Ҫʵ���Լ������ӣ�����д��  
*  
*/  
class_message.prototype.oncommand = function(){  
    //this.close = true;
    //this.hide();
//    alert(this.target);
    if(this.target=="true"){
    	document.getElementsByName('framecon')[0].src=this.action;             
       //document.forms[0].action = this.action;
      // document.forms[0].target = "mainFrame";
	   //document.forms[0].submit();
	   //alert(this.action)	             
    } else if (this.target=='showTopWin') {
    	showTopWin(this.action,750,600);
    } else{
       window.open(this.action);
	}
} 
/**//*  
*    ��Ϣ��ʾ����  
*/  
class_message.prototype.show = function(){  

    var oPopup = window.createPopup(); //IE5.5+  
    
    this.Pop = oPopup;  
  
    var w = this.width;  
    var h = this.height;  
  
    var str = "<DIV style='BORDER-RIGHT: #455690 1px solid; BORDER-TOP: #a6b4cf 1px solid; Z-INDEX: 99999; LEFT: 0px; BORDER-LEFT: #a6b4cf 1px solid; WIDTH: " + w + "px; BORDER-BOTTOM: #455690 1px solid; POSITION: absolute; TOP: 0px; HEIGHT: " + h + "px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #c9d3f3'>"  
        str += "<TABLE style='BORDER-TOP: #ffffff 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #ffffff 1px solid' cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width='100%' bgColor=#cfdef4 border=0>"  
        str += "<TR>"  
        str += "<TD style='FONT-SIZE: 12px;COLOR: #0f2c8c' width=30 height=24></TD>"  
        str += "<TD style='PADDING-LEFT: 4px; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 12px; COLOR: #1f336b; PADDING-TOP: 4px' vAlign=center width='100%'>" + this.caption + "</TD>"  
        str += "<TD style='PADDING-RIGHT: 2px; PADDING-TOP: 2px' vAlign=center align=right width=19>"  
        str += "<SPAN title=�ر� style='FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12px; CURSOR: hand; COLOR: red; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4px' id='btSysClose' >&#215;</SPAN></TD>"  
        str += "</TR>"  
        str += "<TR>"  
        str += "<TD style='PADDING-RIGHT: 1px;PADDING-BOTTOM: 1px' colSpan=3 height=" + (h-28) + ">"  
        str += "<DIV style='BORDER-RIGHT: #b9c9ef 1px solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 8px; BORDER-TOP: #728eb8 1px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 8px; FONT-SIZE: 12px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 8px; BORDER-LEFT: #728eb8 1px solid; WIDTH: 100%; COLOR: #1f336b; PADDING-TOP: 8px; BORDER-BOTTOM: #b9c9ef 1px solid; HEIGHT: 100%'>" + this.title + "<BR><BR>"  
        str += "<DIV style='WORD-BREAK: break-all' align=left><a href='javascript:void(0)' hidefocus=false id='btCommand'><font color=#ff0000>" + this.message + "</font></a> <A href='' hidefocus=false id='ommand'><FONT color=#ff0000></FONT></A></DIV>"  
        str += "</DIV>"  
        str += "</TD>"  
        str += "</TR>"  
        str += "</TABLE>"  
        str += "</DIV>"  
  
    oPopup.document.body.innerHTML = str; 
    
  
    this.offset  = 0; 
    var me  = this;  

    oPopup.document.body.onmouseover = function(){me.pause=true;}
    oPopup.document.body.onmouseout = function(){me.pause=false;}

    var fun = function(){  
        var x  = me.left; 
        var y  = 0; 
        var width    = me.width; 
        var height    = me.height; 

            if(me.offset>me.height){ 
                height = me.height; 
            } else { 
                height = me.offset; 
            } 

        y  = me.bottom - me.offset; 
        if(y<=me.top){ 
            me.timeout--; 
            if(me.timeout==0){ 
                window.clearInterval(me.timer);  
                if(me.autoHide){
                    me.hide(); 
                }
            } 
        } else { 
            me.offset = me.offset + me.step; 
        } 
        me.Pop.show(x,y,width,height);    

    }  
  
    this.timer = window.setInterval(fun,this.speed)      
  
     
  
    var btClose = oPopup.document.getElementById("btSysClose");  
  
    btClose.onclick = function(){  
        me.close = true;
        me.hide();  
    }  
  
    var btCommand = oPopup.document.getElementById("btCommand");  
    btCommand.onclick = function(){  
        me.oncommand();  
    }    
  var ommand = oPopup.document.getElementById("ommand");  
      ommand.onclick = function(){  
       //this.close = true;
      me.hide();  
      window.open(ommand.href);
    }   
}  
/**//* 
** �����ٶȷ��� 
**/ 
class_message.prototype.speed = function(s){ 
    var t = 20; 
    try { 
        t = praseInt(s); 
    } catch(e){} 
    this.speed = t; 
} 
/**//* 
** ���ò������� 
**/ 
class_message.prototype.step = function(s){ 
    var t = 1; 
    try { 
        t = praseInt(s); 
    } catch(e){} 
    this.step = t; 
} 
  
class_message.prototype.rect = function(left,right,top,bottom){ 
    try { 
        this.left        = left    !=null?left:this.right-this.width; 
        this.right        = right    !=null?right:this.left +this.width; 
        this.bottom        = bottom!=null?(bottom>screen.height?screen.height:bottom):screen.height; 
        this.top        = top    !=null?top:this.bottom - this.height; 
    } catch(e){} 
}

function catchDiv(e) {
	
	bIsCatchFlyBar = true;
	var x = event.x + document.body.scrollLeft;
	var y = event.y + document.body.scrollTop;
	
	dragClickX = x - $('##floatDiv##').style.pixelLeft;
	dragClickY = y - $('##floatDiv##').style.pixelTop;

	$('##floatDiv##').setCapture();
	document.onmousemove = moveDiv;
}

function releaseDiv(e) {
	bIsCatchFlyBar = false;
	$('##floatDiv##').releaseCapture();
	document.onmousemove = null;
}


function moveDiv(e){   
	if(bIsCatchFlyBar){   
		$('##floatDiv##').style.left = event.x+document.body.scrollLeft-dragClickX;   
		$('##floatDiv##').style.top = event.y+document.body.scrollTop-dragClickY;   
	}   
  
}   

function loadDiv(){   
  if ($('##floatDiv##')){
	$('##floatDiv##').style.top= top;   
	$('##floatDiv##').style.left= left;   
  }
}

/*====================================================
Version:4.0.0(2011-04-02)
Website:http://www.zfsoft.com
Auther:Sunleoo
Recently:Sunleoo(2011-04-02)
=======================================================*/
/*========全局CSS定义========*/
body { margin:0; padding:0; font:normal 100 12px tahoma, Arial, "宋体"; }
dl, dt, dd, ul, ol, li, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, pre, form, fieldset, lable, textarea, select, p, blockquote, button, tr, td, th, thead, caption { margin:0; padding:0; }
img, button { border:none; }
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, strong { font-weight:800; font-size:12px; vertical-align:middle }
ol, ul, li { list-style:none; }
table { border-collapse:collapse; }
input, select, textarea, button, em, cite, samp { font-style:normal; }
a { text-decoration:none; color:#000; cursor:pointer;outline:none;blr:expression(this.onFocus=this.blur());}
a:hover { text-decoration:underline; color:#00F }
/*===========框架样式start===========*/
/*==========全局框架样式==========*/
.mainbody { width:980px; margin:0 auto; background:#fff; border:1px solid #d4e5fa; }
.mainbody2 { width:990px; border:none; background:none;}
/*====首页框架样式start====*/
.mainframe { width:980px; margin:0 auto; clear:both; min-height:300px; _height:300px; padding-top:8px; padding-bottom:5px; background:url(../images/blue/def_main.jpg) repeat-x left top; }
.mainframe:after { content:"."; display:block; visibility:hidden; height:0; clear:both; }
.mainframe2{width:990px; background:none; padding-top:0px; margin-top:10px;} 
.indexmain { width:98%; margin:0 auto; }
.body2{background:url(../images/blue/body_bg2.jpg) repeat-x left top;}
/*====头部====*/
.topframe { width:980px; text-align:center; margin:0 auto; position:relative; z-index:3; background:url(../images/blue/topframe_bg.jpg) no-repeat left top;}
.topframe:after { content:"."; display:block; height:0; visibility:hidden; clear:both; }
.topframe2 { width:990px; background:url(../images/blue/topframe_bg2.jpg) no-repeat left top;}
.topframe_help { width:100%; height:78px; background:url(../images/blue/top_logo_zxbz.gif) left top no-repeat; }
.leftframe { width:116px; float:left; }
.leftframe2{width:126px; background:#fff;}
.leftframe2 .piclink_01{width:125px; border:1px solid #E3E9EE;}
.leftframe01 { width:776px; float:left; display:inline; margin-left:5px; }
.rightframe { margin:0; width:852px; float:right; margin-right:6px; display:inline; }
.rightframe2{margin-right:0px;}
.rightframe01 { width:184px; float:right; margin-right:6px; display:inline; border:1px solid #D6D6D6; background:#F2F8FC; }
.midframe01 { width:49.3%; float:left; }
.midframe02 { width:49.3%; float:right; }
.botframe { width:980px; clear:both; margin:0 auto; text-align:center; height:65px; background:url(../images/blue/copybg.jpg) repeat-x left top; }
.botframe2{width:990px; border-top:1px solid #BBD6E1;}
.leftframe02 { float:left; display:inline; margin-left:6px; width:67%; }
.rightframe02 { float:right; display:inline; margin-right:6px; width:31%; }
.leftframe03 { width:249px; float:left; display:inline; margin:5px 0 0 13px; }
.rightframe03 { width:700px; float:right; display:inline; margin:5px 13px 0 0; }
.leftframe04 { width:155px; float:left; }
.rightframe04 { width:633px; float:right; }
.rightframe04_hidden { width:790px; float:right; }
/*=======首页框架样式end=======*/
/*=======index框架样式start=======*/
.index_mainbody { width:980px; margin:0 auto; background:#fff; }
.index_topframe { width:100%; background:url(../images/blue/index_topbg.gif) right top no-repeat; }
.index_topframe .head { width:100%; height:114px; }
.index_topframe .head .logo { margin:25px 0 0 30px; }
.index_topframe .menu { background:url(../images/blue/index_navbg.gif) repeat-x left top; width:978px; height:32px; border:#B9CDE7 1px solid; border-bottom:#B9CDE7 1px solid; }
.index_topframe .menu .nav { width:900px; height:32px; float:left; padding-left:20px; }
.index_mainframe { width:100%; min-height:400px; _height:400px; margin-top:8px; padding-bottom:10px; }
.index_mainframe:after { content:"."; display:block; visibility:hidden; height:0; clear:both; }
.index_botframe { width:100%; height:92px; background:url(../images/blue/index_botbg.gif) no-repeat left top; }
.index_leftframe { width:228px; float:left; }
.index_midframe { width:512px; float:left; display:inline; margin-left:6px; }
.index_rightframe { width:228px; float:right; }
/*=======index框架样式end=======*/
/*=======type框架样式start=======*/
.type_left { width:155px; float:left; display:inline; margin-left:1px; }
.type_right { width:815px; float:right; display:inline; margin-right:1px; }
.type_mid { width:815px; border:#BBCEE8 1px solid; margin:0 auto;}
/*=======type框架样式end=======*/
/*=======内容页全局样式start=======*/
.type_mainframe { width:980px; padding:5px 0; margin:0 auto; position:relative; z-index:2; min-height:400px; _height:400px; background:#e7f0fb;}
.type_mainframe2{padding-top:0px; margin-top:10px; width:990px; background:none;}
.type_mainframe_hidden { width:980px; padding:0; margin:0 auto; position:relative; z-index:2; min-height:400px; _height:400px; background:#e7f0fb;}
.type_mainframe:after, .type_mainframe_hidden:after { content:"."; display:block; visibility:hidden; height:0; clear:both; }
.typeleft { width:157px; min-height:623px; _height:623px; display:inline; background:url(../images/blue/type_leftlistbg.jpg) repeat-y left top; margin-left:5px; border:#C0C0C0 1px solid; border-top:none; }
.typeleft2{width:172px; margin-left:0px; background:#fff;}
.typeright { width:803px; margin:0; min-height:623px; _height:623px; padding-bottom:10px; margin-right:4px; display:inline;  background:#fff; border:#E5E5E5 1px solid; }
.typeright2{margin-right:0px;}
.typecon { width:99%; margin:0 auto!important; }
.framecon { /*	border:1px solid #bacee7;*/
}
.typeright_hidden { width:960px; margin:0 auto; margin-right:10px; display:inline; border:#E5E5E5 1px solid; background:#fff; }
.lanmu_main { width:100%; min-height:500px; _height:500px; background:url(../images/blue/lanmu_conbg.gif) no-repeat 400px bottom; }
/*=======左边栏目导航隐藏按钮=======*/
.btn_hide_on button, .btn_hide_on button:hover { width:8px; height:60px; background:url(../images/blue/but_yc01.gif) left top no-repeat; position:absolute; z-index:2; top:200px; left:164px; margin:0; padding:0; border:none!important; outline:none!important; }
.type_mainframe2 .btn_hide_on button, .type_mainframe2 .btn_hide_on button:hover {left:174px;}
.btn_hide_off button, .btn_hide_off button:hover { width:7px; height:60px; background:url(../images/blue/but_yc02.gif) left top no-repeat; position:absolute; z-index:2; top:200px; left:0; border:none!important; outline:none!important; }
/*=======内容页全局样式end=======*/
/*=====顶部logo相关信息=====*/
.head { width:976px; margin:0 auto; height:84px; }
.head .logo { margin-top:10px; padding-left:17px; float:left; }
.head_help h2 img { margin:7px 0 0 19px; }
.head_help .phone { width:250px; float:right; height:70px; line-height:70px; background:url(../images/blue/ico_54.gif) left center no-repeat; padding-left:20px; font-size:14px; color:#666666; }
/*=========版本切换==========*/
.versions {float:left; display:inline; margin-top:33px; margin-left:25px; position:relative; z-index:10001; }
.versions .versions_btn { display:block;height:20px; line-height:20px; text-align:center; color:#1370D8; text-decoration:none;padding-right: 35px;background: url(../images/blue/ico_blue.gif) no-repeat right -995px;}
.versions .versions_btn:hover { }
.versions .versionslist { position:absolute; left:0; top:19px; border:1px solid #57ABF0; width:78px; z-index:10000; background:#F8FBFE; padding:2px 0; }
.versions .versionslist a { display:block; text-align:center; height:22px; line-height:22px; color:#1481E7; background:url(../images/blue/versionsli.gif) no-repeat left bottom; }
/*========个人设置区============*/

/*======黑色细线table========*/
.blacktab { border-collapse:collapse; border-left:1px solid #000; border-bottom:1px solid #000; margin:0 auto; }
.blacktab th, .blacktab td { padding:0.5em 0.6em; vertical-align:middle; border-top:1px solid #000; border-right:1px solid #000; }
.blacktab .title { text-align:center; font-size:14px; font-weight:bold; }
/*====红色表格=========*/
.redtab { border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; margin:2px auto }
.redtab caption { padding: 10px 0; font-size: 25px; font-weight: bold }
.redtab th, .redtab td { padding: 1em 0.6em; text-align: left; vertical-align: middle }
.redtab th { text-align: right }
.redtab input { }
/*============表格换行等样式==============*/
.nowrap td, .nowrap th { white-space: nowrap /*=该表格强制不换行=*/ }
.pre th, .pre th { white-space: nowrap /*=强制显示预先格式化的文本=*/ }
/*=========打印预览页面===========*/

.printview_button { padding: 5px 0 }
/*=========打印表格===========*/
/*====黑线框表格=========*/
.printtab { border-collapse: collapse; margin: 2px auto; border: 1px solid #000 }
.printtab caption { font-size: 20px; color: #000; font-weight: bold; padding: 10px 0 }
.printtab thead th, .printtab thead td { color: #000; font-weight: bold; background: #f5f5f5 }
.printtab th, .printtab td { padding: 0.5em 0.6em; border: 1px solid #000; color: #000 }
.printtab .title { text-align:center; font-size:14px; font-weight:bold; }
.printtab .alt th, .printtab .alt td { background: #F8F8F8 }
.wordbreak { word-break: break-all; word-wrap: break-word }
.center thead th, .center thead td { color: #000; font-weight: bold; background:none; }
.center th, .center td { padding: 0.5em 0; text-align:center; border: 1px solid #000; color: #000 }

button, .button { padding:0 10px; text-align:center; cursor: pointer; margin: 0 3px; letter-spacing:0.1em; overflow:visible;/*===解决左右两侧的间距随文字增加而变大yyl===*/ font-size:12px; height:19px; *height:20px;

padding-bottom:2px;/*==实现FF下文字居中==*/ padding-bottom:0px\9; }

outline:1px solid #4D93EA; border:1px solid #C6DAF4!important; }

/*点击出现日历的input*/

/*=========隐藏显示按钮区样式=========*/

/*========登录口页面样式start========*/

color:#666; }

.login_copyright a:hover { text-decoration:none; color:#0474D2; background:url(../images/logo_copyhov.gif) no-repeat left center; }

.login_statistics a { float:left; width:120px; height:30px; line-height:30px; border:#d5dee8 1px solid; text-indent:45px; font-weight:bold; color:#074aa1!important; text-decoration:none!important; }

/*========ver=======*/
.ver { color:#60819d!important; text-decoration:none!important; background:url(../images/blue/ver_bg.gif) left center repeat-x!important; padding:0 5px!important; border:#cdd7e4 1px solid; height:14px; line-height:14px; white-space:nowrap; display:block; margin-left:10px; }
.ver:hover { border:#a3bedb 1px solid; color:#256194!important; }
/*====*/

.login_prompt p, .login_error p { padding:2px 5px 0px 5px; white-space:nowrap; text-align:left; }

/*========通知=======*/
.notice { height:30px; line-height:30px; background:#fff; border:#E4E9EC 1px solid; margin-bottom:6px; }
.notice h3 { float:left; background:url(../images/ico_notice.gif) no-repeat 10px center; }
.notice h3 span { font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; padding-left:30px; color:#5D799E; }
.notice div { float:left; margin-left:10px; white-space: nowrap; width:730px; overflow:hidden; }
.notice div a { color:#636262; padding-left:5px; margin:0 5px; background:url(../images/blue/ico_blue.gif) no-repeat left -2px;}
.notice div a:hover { color:#D82F2F; text-decoration:underline; }
.notice .close { float:right; width:12px; height:12px; background:url(../images/notice_close.gif) center no-repeat; margin:9px 8px 0 0; cursor:pointer }
.notice .close:hover { margin:7px 8px 0 0; }
/*========提示=======*/
.prompt { line-height:20px; min-height:20px; _height:20px; padding:5px 30px 5px 5px; background:#fffedf url(../images/prompt_ts.gif) 15px 7px no-repeat; border:#f1e0b5 1px solid; margin-bottom:6px; position:relative;}
.prompt .prompt_angle { position:absolute; top:-7px; right:60px; width:13px; height:7px; display:block; background:url(../images/ico_13.gif) no-repeat; }
.prompt:after { content:"."; display:block; visibility:hidden; height:0; clear:both; }
.prompt h3 { float:left;display:none;}
.prompt h3 span { font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; padding-left:25px; color:#0087dc; }
.prompt p { color:#636262;padding-left:70px}
.prompt .close { width:13px; height:13px; background:url(../images/close-icons.gif) center no-repeat; cursor:pointer; border:none!important; position:absolute; top:8px; right:8px; }
.prompt .close:hover { top:7px; }
/*========提示1=======*/
.prompt_01 { line-height:20px; min-height:20px; _height:20px; padding:5px; background:#fffedf; border:#f1e0b5 1px solid; position:relative; width:767px; margin:0 auto; margin-top:10px; }
.prompt_01 p { background:url(../images/blue/ico_62.gif) 10px center no-repeat; padding-left:50px; }
/*=========当前位置===========*/
.tab_cur { width:100%; text-align:left; margin-bottom:2px; background: url(../images/blue/dqwz_bg.gif) left top repeat-x;overflow: hidden;clear: both}
.tab_cur .location { margin-left:5px; text-align:left; height: 30px;line-height: 30px; float:left; }
.tab_cur .location em { background: url(../images/icons.gif) no-repeat -50px 0; padding-left:1.5em; }
.tab_cur .location span { background: url(../images/icons.gif) no-repeat -50px 0; padding-left:1.5em; }
.tab_cur .help { float:right; display:inline; margin-right:10px; background:url(../images/blue/ico_79.gif) left center no-repeat; height:30px; line-height:30px; }
.tab_cur .help a {padding-left:20px;text-decoration:none!important; float:left; color:#0A63BF; background:url(../images/help.gif) right 3px no-repeat; padding-right:25px;}
.tab_cur .help a:hover { color:#417fcd!important; }
.tab_cur .help img { float:left; margin-top:5px; }
.tab_cur .other {float:right; display:inline; margin-right:10px; background:url(../images/blue/ico_80.gif) left center no-repeat; height:30px; line-height:30px; }
.tab_cur .other a { padding-left:20px; color:#135dbb!important; text-decoration:none!important; float:left; }
.tab_cur .other a:hover { color:#417fcd!important; }

.newsnotice h3 { width:100%; height:26px; background:url(../images/blue/main_head01.jpg) no-repeat left center; }

.newsnotice h3 span { float:left; display:inline; margin-left:40px; padding-top:10px; color:#155fbe; font-weight:bold; }
.newsnotice h3 a { float:right; width:42px; height:5px; display:inline; margin:11px 5px 0 0; background:url(../images/blue/ico_more01.gif) left top no-repeat;}
.newsnotice .newscon { width:100%; padding:6px 0; }
.newsnotice .newscon:after { content:"."; display:block; height:0; clear:both; visibility:hidden; }
.newscon .newspic { float:left; margin-left:6px; margin-right:-250px; background:#fff; display:inline; }

.type_navigate { width:92%; margin:3px 0; margin-bottom:6px; border-top:none; padding-bottom:100px; margin-left:4px; border:#ececec 1px solid; background:#fff;}
.type_navigate h3 { width:100%; height:33px; line-height:33px; text-align:left; background:url(../images/blue/type_linkhead01.gif) repeat-x left center;}
.type_navigate h3 span { padding-left:15px; font-size:14px; font-weight:bold; color:#03619d; }
.type_navigate ul { width:90%; margin:0 auto; padding:5px 0; }
.type_navigate ul li { width:100%; text-align:left; height:31px; line-height:31px; padding:3px 0; border-bottom:#e3e3e3 1px solid; }
.type_navigate ul li a { font-weight:bold; display:block; width:100%; text-indent:1.5em; cursor:pointer; text-decoration:none; color:#103054;}
.type_navigate ul li span { display:block; width:100%; background:url(../images/blue/ico_blue.gif) no-repeat 5px -16px; }
.type_navigate ul li a:hover { text-decoration:none; background:url(../images/blue/type_linkbg01.gif) repeat-x left center; }
.type_navigate ul .current a { background:url(../images/blue/type_linkhead_cur.gif) repeat-x left center; color:#fff; }
.type_navigate ul .current a:hover { color:#103054; }
.type_navigate ul .current span { background:url(../images/blue/ico_blue.gif) no-repeat 5px -38px; }
.type_navigate ul .current a:hover span { background:url(../images/blue/ico_blue.gif) no-repeat 5px -16px; }

/*=======维护页面======*/
.maintaining { width:743px; min-height:220px; _height:220px; border:#b8c7db 1px solid; margin:100px auto; }
.maintaining:after { content:"."; display:block; visibility:hidden; height:0; clear:both; }

.maintaining .text h5, .maintaining .text h6 { font-weight:normal; line-height:20px; color:#4c4c4c; text-align:right; }
/*=========显示新闻页样式=======*/
.newspage { margin:20px auto; width:832px; padding-top:30px; background:#fff url(../images/newscont_bg.jpg) no-repeat left top;}
.newspagebg { width:796px; margin:0 auto; padding-bottom:30px; border-left:1px solid #D8D7D7; border-right:1px solid #D8D7D7; border-bottom:1px solid #D8D7D7; background:url(../images/blue/lanmu_conbg.gif) no-repeat right bottom; }
.newspage .title { width: 100%; }
.newspage .title h3 { font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; width: 90%; padding: 20px 0 10px 0; text-align:center; margin:0 auto;  color:#2F2727; background: url(../images/blue/newscont_titlebg.gif) no-repeat left bottom;}
.newspage .title h4 { font-weight: normal; width: 90%; margin: 5px auto; padding: 5px 0; text-align:center; color: #000; border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;}
.newspage .title h4 span { padding-right:10px; }
.newspage .newcont { padding: 10px 0; width: 90%; margin: 10px auto; min-height: 400px; _height: 400px; font-size:16px!important; font-family:宋体!important; line-height:180%!important; }

.newspage img { border:0; max-width:550px; width:expression(width>550?"550px":"px");
overflow:auto; }

//�㽭������Ի��ű���ȡʱ��������
	function dateDiffWithHours(sDate1, sDate2){ 
		  sDate1 = sDate1.replaceAll("-","/");
		  sDate2 = sDate2.replaceAll("-","/");
		  var aDate, oDate1, oDate2,iDays;
		  oDate1= new Date(sDate1.split(' ')[0]);
		  oDate2= new Date(sDate2.split(' ')[0]);
		  aDate = parseInt((oDate2 - oDate1) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /24);
		  iDays = accAdd(getCommonDate(sDate1,sDate2),(aDate-1)<=0?0:(aDate-1));
		  return iDays;
		}
	
//�㽭������Ի��ű���ȡ���ڲ������
	function dateDiffNotWithHours(sDate1, sDate2){ 
		  sDate1 = sDate1.replaceAll("-","/");
		  sDate2 = sDate2.replaceAll("-","/");
		  var aDate, oDate1, oDate2,iDays;
		  oDate1= new Date(sDate1.split(' ')[0]);
		  oDate2= new Date(sDate2.split(' ')[0]);
		  aDate = parseInt((oDate2 - oDate1) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /24);
		  return aDate;
		}

	/*�㽭������Ի���ȡ��β������ʱ����*/
	function getCommonDate(sDate1,sDate2){
	 	sarys = sDate1.split(' ');
	 	sarys1 = sarys[1].split(':');
	 	if(sarys1[0]>17){
	 		sarys1[0]=17;
	 		sarys1[1]=00;
	 	}
	 	if(sarys1[0]< 8){//9
	 		sarys1[0] = 8;//9
	 		sarys1[1] = 00;
	 	}
	 	cDate1 = sarys[0]+" 17:00";
	 	darys = sDate2.split(' ');
	 	darys1 = darys[1].split(':');
	 	if(darys1[0]>17){
	 		darys1[0]=17;
	 		darys1[1]=00;
	 	}
	 	if(darys1[0]< 8){//9
	 		darys1[0] = 8;//9
	 		darys1[1] = 00;
	 	}
	 	dDate1 = darys[0]+" 08:00";
	 	var Date1 = new Date(sarys[0]+" "+sarys1[0]+":"+sarys1[1]);
	 	var Date2 = new Date(cDate1);
	 	var Date3 = new Date(darys[0]+" "+darys1[0]+":"+darys1[1]);
	 	var Date4 = new Date(dDate1);
	 	if(sarys[0] == darys[0]){  
		 	return  parseFloat((Date3 - Date1) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /9).toFixed(1);
	 	}else{
		 	var iDays1 = parseFloat((Date2 - Date1) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /9).toFixed(1);
		 	var iDays2 = parseFloat((Date3 - Date4) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /9).toFixed(1);
		 	return accAdd(iDays1,iDays2);
	 	}
	 }
	/*�㽭������Ի��������ӷ�����*/
	function accAdd(arg1, arg2) {
		  var r1, r2, m;
		  try {
		      r1 = arg1.toString().split(".")[1].length
		  } catch (e) {
		      r1 = 0
		  }
		  try {
		      r2 = arg2.toString().split(".")[1].length
		  } catch (e) {
		      r2 = 0
		  }
		  m = Math.pow(10, Math.max(r1, r2))
		  return (arg1 * m + arg2 * m) / m
		}
		//��Number��������һ��add�����������������ӷ��㡣 
		Number.prototype.add = function (arg) {
		  return accAdd(arg, this);
		}
		
	function dateDiff(sDate1, sDate2){ 
	  var aDate, oDate1, oDate2, iDays;
	   // aDate = sDate1.split("-");
	  //  oDate1 = new Date(aDate[1] + '/' + aDate[2] + '/' + aDate[0]); //ת��Ϊ12-18-2002��ʽ
	  oDate1= new Date(sDate1.substring(0,10).replaceAll("-","/"));
	   // aDate = sDate2.split("-");
	   // oDate2 = new Date(aDate[1] + '/' + aDate[2] + '/' + aDate[0]);
	  oDate2= new Date(sDate2.substring(0,10).replaceAll("-","/"));
	  iDays = parseInt((oDate1 - oDate2) / 1000 / 60 / 60 /24); //�����ĺ�����ת��Ϊ����
	  return iDays;
	}
			
	function getNextDate(curDate,n){
		        //var uom = new Date(new Date(curDate)-0+n*86400000);
		        var uom = new Date(Date.parse(curDate.replace(/-/g,   "/")));
		        uom.setDate(uom.getDate() + n);
		        uom = uom.getFullYear() + "-" +  (uom.getMonth()+1) + "-" + uom.getDate();
		        return uom;
		}

function getClickTj(lx){

	var objName = "tj_"+lx;
	var obj_num = document.getElementsByName(objName).length;
	var obj_arr = new Array();
	var obj_count = 0;
	
	for(var i=0;i<obj_num;i++){
		var obj = document.getElementsByName(objName)[i];
		if(obj.className == "selectedValue"){
			var objId = "tj_"+lx+"_";
			var obj_v = obj.id.replace(objId,"");
			obj_arr[obj_count] = obj_v;
			obj_count++;
		}
	}
	
	return obj_arr;
}

//������ѡ�е�����
function creatClickedTjBySearch(){

	var input_num = $("searchTjDiv").getElementsByTagName('input').length;

	if(input_num != 0){
		
		for(var i=0;i<input_num;i++){
			var obj = $("searchTjDiv").getElementsByTagName('input')[i];
			var tjdm = obj.title;
			var dm = obj.value;

			if(tjdm != ""){
				//�ؼ�ID
				var a_id = "tj_" + tjdm+"_" + dm;
				var xs_id = tjdm+"_mc_xs_" + dm;
				var yc_id = tjdm+"_mc_yc_" + dm;
				
				if($(a_id)){
					$(a_id).onclick();
				}else if($(xs_id)){
					$(xs_id).onclick();
				}else if($(yc_id)){
					$(yc_id).onclick();
				}else{
					dwr.engine.setAsync(false);
					
					if(tjdm == "zy" || tjdm == "bj"){
						searchUtil.getBmpy(dm,tjdm,function(data){
							if(data != null && data != ""){
								var bmpy = data;
								
								var divid = "div_"+tjdm+"_"+bmpy;
								
								if(tjdm == "zy"){//����Ϊרҵ�Ļ�			
									
									clickZyQt(bmpy);
									hiddenZyDiv(divid);
									
									if($(yc_id)){
										$(yc_id).onclick();
									}
								}else if(tjdm == "bj"){//����Ϊ�༶�Ļ�		
									
									clickBjQt(bmpy);
									hiddenZyDiv(divid);
									if($(yc_id)){
										$(yc_id).onclick();
									}
								}
							}
						});
					}else if(tjdm == "qsh"){//���Һ�
					
						var bmpy = dm.substring(0,1);
						var divid = "div_"+tjdm+"_"+bmpy;
						
						clickQshQt(bmpy);
						
						hiddenZyDiv(divid);
						if($(yc_id)){
							$(yc_id).onclick();

//��������ɾ����ѡ����
function removeYxtjByLd(dd_Lx){

	var dd_num = $("yxtj_div").getElementsByTagName('dd').length;

	for(var i=dd_num-1;i>=0;i--){
		var obj = $("yxtj_div").getElementsByTagName('dd')[i];
		var obj_id = obj.id;
		lx = obj_id.split("_")[1];
		if(lx == dd_Lx){
			obj.outerHTML = "";
		}
	}
	
	if($("yxtj_div").getElementsByTagName('dd').length == 0){
		$("yxtj_div").style.display = "none";
	}
}

//�����ѡ����
function getYxtj(dd_Lx){

	var arr = new Array();
	var count = 0;
	
	var dd_num = $("yxtj_div").getElementsByTagName('dd').length;
	
	for(var i=dd_num-1;i>=0;i--){
		var obj = $("yxtj_div").getElementsByTagName('dd')[i];
		var obj_id = obj.id;
		var lx = obj_id.split("_")[1];
		var dm = obj_id.split("_")[0];
		if(lx == dd_Lx){
			arr[count]=dm;
			count++;
		}
	}
	
	return arr;
}

function clickZyQt(zypy){
	var divid = "div_zy_"+zypy;
	var qtid = "div_qt_zy_"+zypy;
	var hiid = "hi_"+zypy;
	
	var userStatus = $("userStatus").value;
	var userName = $("userName").value;
	var userDep = $("userDep").value;
	
	var divHtml ="<div class='search_advanced'><div class='prop-item'  style='border:none !important'>";
		divHtml+="<table width='80%' border='0' class='formlist open01'>";
		divHtml+="<tbody><tr><td colspan='4'>";
		divHtml+="<font color='orange' size='3'>"+zypy+"�ִ�ͷרҵ</font>";
		divHtml+="</td></tr>";
		
		//�����tr����
		var tr_num = "6";
		
		dwr.engine.setAsync(false);
				
		searchUtil.getZyInfoByPy(zypy,userStatus,userName,userDep,function(data){
		
			if(data !=null && data.length >0){
				
				var size = data.length;
				
				//������������ʵ������Ϊ׼
				if((size/4) > tr_num){
					tr_num = parseInt(size/4);
					
					//���һ�з����������
					var sy_num = parseInt(size%4);
					if(sy_num != "0"){
						tr_num =parseInt(tr_num)+1;
					}
				}
				
				var n = size;
				for(var i=0;i<tr_num;i++){
					
					divHtml+="<tr>";
					
					for(var j=0;j<4;j++){
					
						if(n <= size && n >= 0){
						
							n--;
							
							if(n!=-1){
							
								var zyid = "a_zy_"+data[n].zydm;
								var xsid = "zy_mc_xs_"+data[n].zydm;
								var ycid = "zy_mc_yc_"+data[n].zydm;
							
								divHtml+="<td width='25%'>";
								if(!$(xsid) && !$(ycid)){
									
									var zymc = data[n].zymc;

									if(zymc.length > 6){
										zymc = zymc.substring(0,6)+"...";
									}
									divHtml+="<li><a href='#' class='bg_none' name='a_zy_mc'id=\""+ycid+"\" style=\"white-space: nowrap;\"";
									divHtml+="title=\""+data[n].zymc+"\"";
									divHtml+="onclick=\"clickZy(this);";
									divHtml+="creatClickedTj('zy','רҵ','"+data[n].zydm+"','"+data[n].zymc+"',this);return false;\"";
									divHtml+=">"+zymc+"</a></li>";
								}else{
									divHtml+="&nbsp;";
								}
								divHtml+="</td>";
							
							}else{
								divHtml+="<td width='25%'>&nbsp;</td>";
							}	
						}else{
							divHtml+="<td width='25%'>&nbsp;</td>";
						}
					}
					
					divHtml+="</tr>";
				}
			}
		});
				
		dwr.engine.setAsync(true);
			
		divHtml+="</tbody>";
		divHtml+="<tfoot><tr><td colspan='4'><div class='btn'>";
		divHtml+="<button onclick=\"hiddenZyDiv('"+divid+"');return false;\" id='buttonSave'>ȷ��</button>";
		divHtml+="</div></td></tr></tfoot>";
		divHtml+="</table></div></div>";
		
	createOtherDiv("רҵѡ��",divHtml,divid,"600","380");

}

//���ɲ�	
function createOtherDiv(title,divHtml,divid,width,height){
	var isbackDiv = true;
	if($(divid)==null){//��ʾ������ 
		var floatDiv = document.createElement('div');
		floatDiv.id = divid;
		floatDiv.style.position = "absolute";
		floatDiv.style.width = width;
		floatDiv.style.height = height;
		floatDiv.style.backgroundColor = "#FFFFFF";
		floatDiv.style.overflow = "hidden";
		floatDiv.style.border = "1px solid rgb(167, 189, 211)";
		
		var d_width = document.body.clientWidth;
		var d_height = document.body.clientHeight;
		var d_left_top = (d_width - width) / 2 +"px";
		var d_top_top =  "100" + "px";
		
		floatDiv.style.top = d_top_top;
		floatDiv.style.left = d_left_top;
		floatDiv.style.zIndex  = 1001;
		
	
		//temp_divHtml=divHtml;
		
		var dd_html="";
		dd_html += "<div id=\"windown-title\" align='left'><h2>"+title+"</h2>";
		dd_html += "<span id=\"windown-close\" onclick=\"hiddenZyDiv('"+divid+"');return false;\">ȷ��</span>";
		dd_html += "</div>";
		dd_html += "<div id=\"open_win\" class=\"open_win01\" style=\"padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:5px;\">";
		floatDiv.innerHTML = dd_html+divHtml+"</div>";
		//document.getElementById(divId).innerHTML = "";
		//document.body.removeAttribute($(divId))
		document.forms[0].appendChild(floatDiv);
	}else{
		$(divid).style.display = "block";
	}
	
	if($('##backDiv##')==null && isbackDiv ==true){//��ʾ����  
	
		var backDiv = document.createElement('div');
		backDiv.id = "##backDiv##";
		backDiv.style.backgroundColor = "Black";
		backDiv.style.filter = "alpha(opacity=60)";
		backDiv.style.MozOpacity = "0.70";
		backDiv.style.position = "absolute";
		backDiv.style.left = "0px";
		backDiv.style.top = "0px";
		backDiv.style.width = Math.max(document.body.scrollWidth, document.body.clientWidth);
		var t_height = Math.max(document.body.scrollHeight, document.body.clientHeight);
		if(t_height <800){
			t_height = 800; 
		}
		backDiv.style.height = t_height+"px";
		document.body.appendChild(backDiv);
		$('##backDiv##').style.xIndex = 1000;
	}else if(isbackDiv ==true){
		$('##backDiv##').style.display = "block";
	}
	
	i = document.getElementsByTagName("select").length;
	for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
		var obj = document.getElementsByTagName("select")[j];
		var id = obj.id;
		var arr;
		var splitName;
		
		if ($(id)){
			arr = id.split('_');
		}
		
		if (null != arr && arr.length>0){
			splitName=arr[0];
		}
		
		if (splitName!="select"){
			obj.style.display = "none";
		}
		
	}
}

	for(var i=0;i<PY_BIG.length;i++){
		var id = "div_zy_"+PY_BIG[i];
		if($(id)){
			//�����ѡ����
			var a_num = $(id).getElementsByTagName('a').length;
			for(var j=0;j<a_num;j++){
				var obj = $(id).getElementsByTagName('a')[j];

					var a_id = obj.id;
					var zydm = a_id.substring(9,obj.id.length);

	}

function hiddenZyDiv(id){

	$(id).style.display="none";
	
	if($('##backDiv##')!=null){ 
		$('##backDiv##').style.display = "none";
	}
	
	i = document.getElementsByTagName("select").length;

function getClickLd_Third(){

	//¥��
	var lddm_num = document.getElementsByName("a_lddm_mc").length;
	var lddm_arr = new Array();
	var lddm_count = 0;

	for(var i=0;i<lddm_num;i++){
		var obj = document.getElementsByName("a_lddm_mc")[i];
		if(obj.className == "selectedValue"){
			var lddm_v = obj.id.split("_")[3];
			lddm_arr[lddm_count] = lddm_v;
			lddm_count++;
		}
	}
	
	return lddm_arr;
}

function creatClickedTjBySearch_Third(){

	var input_num = $("searchTjDiv").getElementsByTagName('input').length;

	if(input_num != 0){
		
		for(var i=0;i<input_num;i++){
			var obj = $("searchTjDiv").getElementsByTagName('input')[i];
			var tjdm = obj.title;
			var dm = obj.value;
			
			if(tjdm != ""){
				//�ؼ�ID
				var a_id = "tj_" + tjdm+"_" + dm;
				var xs_id = tjdm+"_mc_xs_" + dm;
				var yc_id = tjdm+"_mc_yc_" + dm;
				
				if($(a_id)){
					$(a_id).onclick();
				}else if($(xs_id)){
					$(xs_id).onclick();
				}else if($(yc_id)){
					$(yc_id).onclick();
				}else{
					dwr.engine.setAsync(false);
					
					if(tjdm == "qsh"){//���Һ�
					
						var bmpy = dm.substring(0,1);
						var divid = "div_"+tjdm+"_"+bmpy;
						
						clickQshQt_Third(bmpy);
						
						hiddenZyDiv(divid);
						if($(yc_id)){
							$(yc_id).onclick();
						}
					}
					
					dwr.engine.setAsync(true);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

function creatClickedTj_Third(tjdm,tjmc,dm,mc,obj){

	$("yxtj_div").style.display = "";
	
	var className = obj.className;
	var id = dm + "_" + tjdm + "_yxtj_dd";

	var dlHtml = $("yxtj_dl").innerHTML;

	if(className == "selectedValue"){//�����ѯ
		dlHtml+= "<dd id=\""+id+"\">";
		dlHtml+= "<a href=\"#\" onclick=\"removeYxtj_Third('"+tjdm+"','"+dm+"');return false;\">";
		dlHtml+= "<h5>"+tjmc+"</h5>";
		dlHtml+= mc;
		dlHtml+= "<span class=\"close-icon\" title=\"ȡ��\"></span></a></dd>";
		$("yxtj_dl").innerHTML = dlHtml;
	}else{
		$("yxtj_dl").innerHTML = dlHtml;
		$(id).outerHTML = "";
	}
	
	//�ж��Ƿ�Ҫ������ѡ����DIV
	hiddenYxtjDiv();
}

//�Ƴ���ѡ����
function removeYxtj_Third(tjdm,dm){

	var dd_id = dm + "_" + tjdm + "_yxtj_dd";
	var a_id = "tj_" + tjdm+"_" + dm;
	var xs_id = tjdm+"_mc_xs_" + dm;
	var yc_id = tjdm+"_mc_yc_" + dm;

	if($(dd_id)){
		$(dd_id).outerHTML = "";
	}
	
	if($(a_id)){
		$(a_id).className="";
	}

	if($(xs_id)){
		$(xs_id).className="";
	}
	
	if($(yc_id)){
		$(yc_id).className="";
	}
	
	//�ж��Ƿ�Ҫ������ѡ����DIV
	hiddenYxtjDiv();
	
	if(tjdm == "lddm" || tjdm == "ch" ){
		//¥��
		var ld_click = getClickLd_Third();
		//�Ƿ���¥��
		var flag = false;
		if(ld_click.length > 0 ){
			flag = true;
		}
	
		//������������
		if($("qsh_ul")){
			if(flag){
				$("qsh_dl").style.display = "";
				//��������
				setNewQsh_Third();
				//�����������DIV
				removeQshDiv_Third();
			}else{
				$("qsh_dl").style.display = "none";
			}
		}
	}
	
	if(tjdm == "lddm"){
		//���ڲ������
		if($("ch_ul")){
			//�������
			setNewCh_Third();
			//��ղ������DIV
//			removeZyDiv();
		}
	}
	
}

function getClickTid(){

	//��obj
	var tid_num = document.getElementsByName("tj_tid").length;
	var tid_arr = new Array();
	var tid_count = 0;

	for(var i=0;i<tid_num;i++){

	return tid_arr;
}

	var userDep = $("userDep").value;

	var divHtml ="<div class='search_advanced'><div class='prop-item'  style='border:none !important'>";
		divHtml+="<table width='80%' border='0' class='formlist open01'>";

		divHtml+="<font color='orange' size='3'>"+xmpy+"�ִ�ͷ��Ŀ</font>";
		divHtml+="</td></tr>";
		
		divHtml+="<tr><td colspan='4'>";
		divHtml+="<div style=\"height:260px;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto;\"><table style=\"width:100%\">";

		//�����tr����
		var tr_num = "6";
		
		dwr.engine.setAsync(false);

			if(data !=null && data.length >0){
				
				var size = data.length;
				
				//������������ʵ������Ϊ׼
				if((size/2) > tr_num){
					tr_num = parseInt(size/2);
					
					//���һ�з����������
					var sy_num = parseInt(size%2);
					if(sy_num != "0"){
						tr_num =parseInt(tr_num)+1;
					}
				}
				
				var n = size;
				for(var i=0;i<tr_num;i++){
					
					divHtml+="<tr style=\"width:100%;height:30px;\">";
					
					for(var j=0;j<2;j++){
					
						if(n <= size && n >= 0){
						
							n--;
							
							if(n!=-1){
							
								var xmid = "a_xm_"+data[n].xmdm;
								var xsid = "xm_mc_xs_"+data[n].xmdm;

									divHtml+="title=\""+data[n].xmmc+"\"";
									divHtml+="onclick=\"clickBj(this);";
									divHtml+="creatClickedTj('xmmc','��Ŀ����','"+data[n].xmdm+"','"+data[n].xmmc+"',this);return false;\"";
									divHtml+=">"+xmmc+"</a></li>";
								}else{
									divHtml+="&nbsp;";
								}
								divHtml+="</td>";
							
							}else{
								divHtml+="<td style=\"width:50%;\">&nbsp;</td>";
							}	
						}else{
							divHtml+="<td style=\"width:50%;\">&nbsp;</td>";
						}
					}
					
					divHtml+="</tr>";
				}
			}
		});
				
		dwr.engine.setAsync(true);		
			
		divHtml+="</table></div>";
		divHtml+="</td></tr>";
		divHtml+="</tbody>";
		divHtml+="<tfoot><tr><td colspan='4'><div class='btn'>";
		divHtml+="<button onclick=\"hiddenZyDiv('"+divid+"');return false;\" id='buttonSave'>ȷ��</button>";
		divHtml+="</div></td></tr></tfoot>";
		divHtml+="</table></div></div>";
		
	createOtherDiv("��Ŀ����ѡ��",divHtml,divid,"600","380");
}

Version: Ver 1.0
Passed : XHtml 1.0, CSS 2.0, IE5.0+, FF1.0+, Opera8.5+
Update : 2010-08-23
*****************************/
function mouseover(str) {
if(document.getElementById(str)) {
document.getElementById(str).style.display="";
}
}
function mouseout(str) {
if(document.getElementById(str)) {
document.getElementById(str).style.display="none";
}
}

/*****************************
showhideDiv
Version: Ver 1.02
Passed : XHtml 1.0, CSS 2.0, IE5.0+, FF1.0+, Opera8.5+
Update : 2010-07-28
*****************************/
function getNext(o)
{
	while(o)
	{
		if(o.nextSibling.nodeType==1)
		{return o.nextSibling;}
		o=o.nextSibling;
	}
	return o;
}	
function showhidediv(o,id)
{
	var menuList=document.getElementById('gnmkid').value;
	var arrId = new Array();
	
	gnmk = menuList.split(splitSignOne);
	
    var sbtitle = getNext(o);
	if(sbtitle)
	{	
   		if(sbtitle.style.display=='block')
		{	
      	 	sbtitle.style.display = 'none';
       		o.className = "open";
   		}
		else
		{
   			sbtitle.style.display = 'block';
  			o.className = "close";
  			//�㿪һ����ģ��ر���չ����ģ��by qlj 2011.6.23
  			for(i = 2; i < gnmk.length; i++){
  				var ulid = "ul"+i;
  				var divid = "hh"+i;
  				if(ulid !=sbtitle.id && $(ulid)){
  					$(ulid).style.display = 'none';
  					$(divid).className = "open";
  				}
  			}
   		}
	
		if(sbtitle.style.display=='none')
		{

       		o.className = "open";
   		}
		else
		{
   			sbtitle.style.display = 'block';
  			o.className = "close";
   		}
		
	}
}

/*****************************
JavaScript Code for CNLTreeMenu
Version: Ver 1.02
Passed : XHtml 1.0, CSS 2.0, IE5.0+, FF1.0+, Opera8.5+
Update : 2010-07-28
*****************************/
function Ob(o){
 var o=document.getElementById(o)?document.getElementById(o):o;
 return o;
}
function Hd(o) {
 Ob(o).style.display="none";
}
function Sw(o) {
 Ob(o).style.display="";
}
function ExCls(o,a,b,n){
 var o=Ob(o);
 for(i=0;i<n;i++) {o=o.parentNode;}
 o.className=o.className==a?b:a;
}
function CNLTreeMenu(id,TagName0) {
  this.id=id;
  this.TagName0=TagName0==""?"li":TagName0;
  this.AllNodes = Ob(this.id).getElementsByTagName(TagName0);
  this.InitCss = function (ClassName0,ClassName1,ClassName2,ImgUrl,parentId) {
  this.ClassName0=ClassName0;
  this.ClassName1=ClassName1;
  this.ClassName2=ClassName2;
  this.ImgUrl=ImgUrl || " ";
  this.ImgBlankA ="<img src=\""+this.ImgUrl+"\" class=\"s\" onclick=\"ExCls(this,'"+ClassName0+"','"+ClassName1+"',1);\" />";
  this.ImgBlankB ="<img src=\""+this.ImgUrl+"\" class=\"s\" />";
  
  	//=======edit by lr 2011.1.20 ==========
	  if(parentId != undefined && parentId != ""){
		 var num = 0;
		 this.AllNodes = [];
		 for(var m=0; m<Ob(parentId).children.length;m++){
			 if(Ob(parentId).children[m].tagName == "UL"){
				 this.AllNodes = Ob(parentId).children[m].children;
			 }
		 }
	  }
	  //=====end======================
  
  
  for (i=0;i<this.AllNodes.length;i++ ) {
   this.AllNodes[i].className==""?this.AllNodes[i].className=ClassName1:"";
   this.AllNodes[i].innerHTML=(this.AllNodes[i].className==ClassName2?this.ImgBlankB:this.ImgBlankA)+this.AllNodes[i].innerHTML;
   }
 }
 this.SetNodes = function (n) {
  var sClsName=n==0?this.ClassName0:this.ClassName1;
  for (i=0;i<this.AllNodes.length;i++ ) {
   this.AllNodes[i].className==this.ClassName2?"":this.AllNodes[i].className=sClsName;
  }
 }
}

//var templateSrc = ""; 设置loading.gif路径
function tipsWindown(title,content,width,height,drag,time,showbg,cssName) {
	jQuery("#windown-box").remove(); //请除内容
	var width = width>= 950?this.width=950:this.width=width;	    //设置朄1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�窗口宽庄1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7

			simpleWindown_html += "<div id=\"windown-box\" class=\"windown-box\" >";

			simpleWindown_html += "</div>";

				jQuery("body>form:first").append(simpleWindown_html);
			}else{
				jQuery("body").append(simpleWindown_html);
			}
			show = false;
	}
	contentType = content.substring(0,content.indexOf(":"));
	content = content.substring(content.indexOf(":")+1,content.length);
	switch(contentType) {
		case "text":
			jQuery("#windown-content").html(content);
		break;
		case "id":
			tempID = content;
			tempHTML = jQuery("#"+content+"").html();
			
			jQuery("#windown-content").html(tempHTML);
			jQuery("#"+content+"").attr('innerHTML','');
		break;
		case "img":
			jQuery("#windown-content").ajaxStart(function() {
				jQuery(this).html("<img src='../images/loading.gif' class='loading' />");
			});
			jQuery.ajax({
				error:function(){
					jQuery("#windown-content").html("<p class='windown-error'>??...</p>");
				},
				success:function(html){
					jQuery("#windown-content").html("<img src="+content+" alt='' />");
				}
			});
		break;
		case "url":
			var content_array=content.split("#");
			jQuery("#windown-content").ajaxStart(function(){
				jQuery(this).html("<p class='loading'/></p>");
			});
			jQuery.ajax({
				type:content_array[0],
				url:content_array[1],
				data:content_array[2],
				async: false,
				error:function(){
					jQuery("#windown-content").html("<p class='windown-error'>加载数据出错...</p>");
				},
				success:function(html){
					jQuery("#windown-content").html(html);
				}
			});
		break;
		case "iframe":
		jQuery("#windown-content").ajaxStart(function(){
			jQuery(this).html("<img src='../images/loading.gif' class='loading' />");
		});
		jQuery.ajax({
			error:function(){
				jQuery("#windown-content").html("<p class='windown-error'>加载数据出错...</p>");
			},
			success:function(html){
				jQuery("#windown-content").html("<iframe src=\""+content+"\" width=\"100%\" height=\""+parseInt(height)+"px"+"\" scrolling=\"auto\" frameborder=\"0\" marginheight=\"0\" marginwidth=\"0\"></iframe>");
			}
		});
	}
	jQuery("#windown-title h2").html(title);
	if(showbg == "true") {jQuery("#windownbg").show();}else {jQuery("#windownbg").remove();};
	jQuery("#windownbg").animate({opacity:"0.5"},"normal");//设置透明庄1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7�1�7
	jQuery("#windown-box").show();

	}else {
		jQuery("#windown-title").css({width:(parseInt(width)+10)+"px"});
		jQuery("#windown-content").css({width:width+"px",height:height+"px"});
	}
	var	cw = document.documentElement.clientWidth,ch = document.documentElement.clientHeight,est = document.documentElement.scrollTop;

	}else {
		jQuery("#windown-box").css({left:"50%",top:"220px",marginTop:-((parseInt(height)+53)/2)+"px",marginLeft:-((parseInt(width)+32)/2)+"px",zIndex: "998"});
	};
	var Drag_ID = document.getElementById("windown-box"),DragHead = document.getElementById("windown-title");
		
	var moveX = 0,moveY = 0,moveTop,moveLeft = 0,moveable = false;
		if ( _version == 6.0 ) {
			moveTop = est;
		}else {
			moveTop = 0;
		}
	var	sw = Drag_ID.scrollWidth,sh = Drag_ID.scrollHeight;
		DragHead.onmouseover = function(e) {
			if(drag == "true"){DragHead.style.cursor = "move";}else{DragHead.style.cursor = "default";}
		};
		DragHead.onmousedown = function(e) {
		if(drag == "true"){moveable = true;}else{moveable = false;}
		e = window.event?window.event:e;
		var ol = Drag_ID.offsetLeft, ot = Drag_ID.offsetTop-moveTop;
		moveX = e.clientX-ol;
		moveY = e.clientY-ot;
		document.onmousemove = function(e) {
				if (moveable) {
				e = window.event?window.event:e;
				var x = e.clientX - moveX;
				var y = e.clientY - moveY;
					if ( x > 0 &&( x + sw < cw) && y > 0 && (y + sh < ch) ) {
						Drag_ID.style.left = x + "px";
						Drag_ID.style.top = parseInt(y+moveTop) + "px";
						Drag_ID.style.margin = "auto";
						}
					}
				}
		document.onmouseup = function () {moveable = false;};
		Drag_ID.onselectstart = function(e){return false;}
	}
	jQuery("#windown-content").attr("class","windown-"+cssName);
	
	if( time == "" || typeof(time) == "undefined") {
		jQuery("#windown-close").click(function() {
			closeWindown();
		});
	}else { 
		setTimeout('closeWindown',time);
	}
	
	jQuery("#windownbg").focus();
	return false;
}

		jQuery("#windown-close").click(function() {
			closeWindown();
		});
	}else { 
		setTimeout('closeWindown',time);
	}
	
	jQuery("#windownbg").focus();
	return false;
}
